author: Staff Reporter
text:
The sudden engine failure of passenger ship, M.V. Nancowry irked hundreds of passengers who were left stranded at Chennai port.

Police said that passengers arrived at the port to board the ship, which was supposed to leave at 6 p.m. on Monday. However, the engine failure resulted in confusion among passengers as they were not able to avail information on whether the port authorities would arrange alternative transport for them. After waiting for an hour, the passengers left the port after authorities told them that the ship would leave on Thursday.
title: Ship delay irks passengers
